data.raw:
Arrow

Left and right arrows used for navigation.
They have active and inactive states and come in any colors.

Styleguide arrow
data.description: Left and right arrows used for navigation. They have active and inactive states and come in any colors.

data.raw:
Breakpoints

Used to adapt content and design to various devices.

Styleguide breakpoints
data.description: Used to adapt content and design to various devices.

data.raw:
Color overlay

Applies a tint on an image. Used to make portfolio items look 'blueish' —uniform— on the Works page.
Based on [this excellent idea](http://www.impressivewebs.com/image-tint-blend-css/).

Styleguide color-overlay
data.description: Applies a tint on an image. Used to make portfolio items look 'blueish' —uniform— on the Works page. Based on this excellent idea.

data.raw:
Colors

The colors together with the color pairs.
Colors don't exist alone yet in pairs, like black on white.
All color pairs have a contrast ratio set for perfect readability using [Lea Verou's excellent contrast checking tool](http://leaverou.github.io/contrast-ratio/).

Styleguide colors
data.description: The colors together with the color pairs. Colors don't exist alone yet in pairs, like black on white. All color pairs have a contrast ratio set for perfect readability using Lea Verou's excellent contrast checking tool.

data.raw:
DL

A simple data list. The data title is underlined.

Styleguide dl
data.description: A simple data list. The data title is underlined.

data.raw:
Figure

Displaying images responsive and retina friendly way
using the [Picturefill library](http://scottjehl.github.io/picturefill/).

Styleguide figure
data.description: Displaying images responsive and retina friendly way using the Picturefill library.

data.raw:
Fonts

Typefaces and fonts used across the site.
They are never used directly but set up properly with the `text-style` mixin.

Styleguide fonts
data.description: Typefaces and fonts used across the site. They are never used directly but set up properly with the text-style mixin.

data.raw:
Intrinsic ratio

Setting a container to a specific size defined by standard metrics like 16:9 (HD) or 4:3 and so on.
The original idea comes from [A List Apart article](http://alistapart.com/article/creating-intrinsic-ratios-for-video).

Styleguide intrinsic-ratio
data.description: Setting a container to a specific size defined by standard metrics like 16:9 (HD) or 4:3 and so on. The original idea comes from A List Apart article.

data.raw:
Link

Simple link styling. By default no underline just differentiation by color or text style.
However links inside a long text can be decorated with an underline, or, inactive menu items can be decorated by a line-through.

Styleguide link
data.description: Simple link styling. By default no underline just differentiation by color or text style. However links inside a long text can be decorated with an underline, or, inactive menu items can be decorated by a line-through.

data.raw:
Long-dash

A slighly wider dash used instead of the regular dash (—). This is one of the stylemarks of this site's design.

Styleguide long-dash
data.description: A slighly wider dash used instead of the regular dash (—). This is one of the stylemarks of this site's design.

data.raw:
Paragraph

Consecutive paragraphs are separated by an empty line for better readability.

Styleguide p
data.description: Consecutive paragraphs are separated by an empty line for better readability.

data.raw:
Scale

Typographic grid and scale.
Different font sizes based on the [Modular Scale 4:3 Perfect Fourth](http://www.modularscale.com/?1&em&1.333&web&text) settings.

Styleguide scale
data.description: Typographic grid and scale. Different font sizes based on the Modular Scale 4:3 Perfect Fourth settings.

data.raw:
Text style

Typographic settings for different text types.
Each text type has set a `font`, a `scale`, a `color` and additional parameters like letter-spacing, max-width or else.
Everything text is set using this `text-style` mixin. We don't set `color` or `font` directly for a text.

Styleguide text-style
data.description: Typographic settings for different text types. Each text type has set a font, a scale, a color and additional parameters like letter-spacing, max-width or else. Everything text is set using this text-style mixin. We don't set color or font directly for a text.

data.raw:
Transition

Smooth animation transition using a cubic-bezier function following the recommendations from [Google Web Fundamentals](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/look-and-feel/animations/animating-between-views).
It is used for all animations like the slider or hovering an element.


Styleguide transition
data.description: Smooth animation transition using a cubic-bezier function following the recommendations from Google Web Fundamentals. It is used for all animations like the slider or hovering an element.

data.raw:
UL

Unordered lists.
No bullets or other decorators.

Styleguide ul
data.description: Unordered lists. No bullets or other decorators.

data.raw:
Uppercase

Uppercase text. Letters inside an uppercase text have larger letter spacing for better readability.

Styleguide uppercase
data.description: Uppercase text. Letters inside an uppercase text have larger letter spacing for better readability.
